Previous study develop strategy evaluate psychological influence operation find postoperative psychological state significantly associate outcomes patient . Whether full-scale evaluation preoperative psychological status surgical patient could predictor postoperative outcome still completely understood . The investigator hypothesize preoperative psychological assessment would important predictor outcome .
